amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Secretary to allocate program funds made available to the territories according to quantifiable measures that are indicative of the surface transportation requirements of each of the territories.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 34 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to require the Secretary to allocate program funds made available to the territories according to quantifiable measures that are indicative of the surface transportation requirements of each of the territories.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Radewagen amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 113 - 310 (Roll no. 593).

action.text: Amendment offered by Mrs. Radewagen of American Samoa to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment offered by Mrs. Radewagen of American Samoa to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Radewagen amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 113 - 310 (Roll no. 593).
